argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | isfldidl2.1 | |- G = ( 1st ` K ) |
| 2 |  | isfldidl2.2 | |- H = ( 2nd ` K ) |
| 3 |  | isfldidl2.3 | |- X = ran G |
| 4 |  | isfldidl2.4 | |- Z = ( GId ` G ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( GId ` H ) = ( GId ` H ) |
| 6 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 | #P_isfldidl | |- ( K e. Fld <-> ( K e. CRingOps /\ ( GId ` H ) =/= Z /\ ( Idl ` K ) = { { Z } , X } ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_crngorngo | |- ( K e. CRingOps -> K e. RingOps ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqcom | |- ( ( GId ` H ) = Z <-> Z = ( GId ` H ) ) |
| 9 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 | #P_0rngo | |- ( K e. RingOps -> ( Z = ( GId ` H ) <-> X = { Z } ) ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_syl5bb | |- ( K e. RingOps -> ( ( GId ` H ) = Z <-> X = { Z } ) ) |
| 11 | 7, 10 | #P_syl | |- ( K e. CRingOps -> ( ( GId ` H ) = Z <-> X = { Z } ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_necon3bid | |- ( K e. CRingOps -> ( ( GId ` H ) =/= Z <-> X =/= { Z } ) ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_anbi1d | |- ( K e. CRingOps -> ( ( ( GId ` H ) =/= Z /\ ( Idl ` K ) = { { Z } , X } ) <-> ( X =/= { Z } /\ ( Idl ` K ) = { { Z } , X } ) ) ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_pm5.32i | |- ( ( K e. CRingOps /\ ( ( GId ` H ) =/= Z /\ ( Idl ` K ) = { { Z } , X } ) ) <-> ( K e. CRingOps /\ ( X =/= { Z } /\ ( Idl ` K ) = { { Z } , X } ) ) ) |
| 15 |  | #P_3anass | |- ( ( K e. CRingOps /\ ( GId ` H ) =/= Z /\ ( Idl ` K ) = { { Z } , X } ) <-> ( K e. CRingOps /\ ( ( GId ` H ) =/= Z /\ ( Idl ` K ) = { { Z } , X } ) ) ) |
| 16 |  | #P_3anass | |- ( ( K e. CRingOps /\ X =/= { Z } /\ ( Idl ` K ) = { { Z } , X } ) <-> ( K e. CRingOps /\ ( X =/= { Z } /\ ( Idl ` K ) = { { Z } , X } ) ) ) |
| 17 | 14, 15, 16 | #P_3bitr4i | |- ( ( K e. CRingOps /\ ( GId ` H ) =/= Z /\ ( Idl ` K ) = { { Z } , X } ) <-> ( K e. CRingOps /\ X =/= { Z } /\ ( Idl ` K ) = { { Z } , X } ) ) |
| 18 | 6, 17 | #P_bitri | |- ( K e. Fld <-> ( K e. CRingOps /\ X =/= { Z } /\ ( Idl ` K ) = { { Z } , X } ) ) |
